name: FWindowStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an SWindow

MinimizeButtonStyle: Style used to draw the window minimize button
MaximizeButtonStyle: Style used to draw the window maximize button
RestoreButtonStyle: Style used to draw the window restore button
CloseButtonStyle: Style used to draw the window close button
TitleTextStyle: Style used to draw the window title text
ActiveTitleBrush: Brush used to draw the window title area when the window is active
InactiveTitleBrush: Brush used to draw the window title area when the window is inactive
FlashTitleBrush: Brush used to draw the window title area when the window is flashing
BackgroundColor: Color used to draw the window background
OutlineBrush: Brush used to draw the window outline
OutlineColor: Color used to draw the window outline
BorderBrush: Brush used to draw the window border
BorderColor: Color used to draw the window border
BackgroundBrush: Brush used to draw the window background
ChildBackgroundBrush: Brush used to draw the background of child windows
WindowCornerRadius: Window corner rounding.  If this value is <= 0 no rounding will occur.   Used for regular, non-maximized windows only (not tool-tips or decorators.)
BorderPadding: Window corner rounding.  If this value is <= 0 no rounding will occur.   Used for regular, non-maximized windows only (not tool-tips or decorators.)
